data.name: Construction Loan
data.description: Our Construction Loan offers flexible finance options to suit the needs of property developers.

features.additionalInfo: Our property finance specialists will work with you to create and implement customised finance solutions from the ground up.
Our team includes local lenders whose expertise can provide valuable insights for both developers and investors.
An 'Approval in Principle' property loan can help ensure you never miss an opportunity.
We can arrange for interest capitalisation subject to credit approval
A prompt payment process to assist with cash flow.
To find out more call 133 800 or email us for more information

Variable interest rate facility only. Fixed rates are not available, however once the loan has been funded, tranches of the facility can be refinanced to a Fixed Rate Business Loan on request (subject to Credit approval and re-documentation).
Subject to terms and conditions, this product has EXTRA_REPAYMENTS option available.
Relationship management is available for eligible customers.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Your business must be registered in Australia

A business entity domiciled in Australia or an individual 18 years and above or strata corporation domiciled in Australia and requires the funding for business or investment purposes other than investment in residential property

fees.name: External Consultancy Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fees associated with engaging external consultants eg Quantity Surveyor, Panel Engineer etc. Fee will vary and be quoted individually by consultant as required

fees.name: Success Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at completion of the project. Subject to negotiation

fees.name: Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee for execution of consents such as consent for strata and/or conense for linen plans

fees.name: Loan Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we agree to discharge a security linked to the facility
